headline: JD Vance massively triggers left with glowing MTG endorsement, vow to take country back from ‘scumbags’
author: Terresa Monroe-Hamilton
sentences:
Unfortunately, there are too few like her, and so long as that’s the case, Republicans may win an election from time to time, but we’ll never do the difficult work of truly taking our country back from the leftwing mob and the woke corporations.”
Greene told Fox News Digital that “JD Vance is the conservative warrior that the entire America First movement needs fighting for us in the U.S. Senate, and that’s why I’m proud to endorse him.”
Honored to have Marjorie’s endorsement.

“It’s time to start electing strong conservatives like JD, who put People over Politicians and understand exactly what we’re up against, and don’t just talk a good game on cable news, but who actually have the courage to fight back against the radical left to save America and stop Communism.”
Vance is a conservative venture capitalist and a bestselling author, who wrote, “Hillbilly Elegy,” which became a New York Times bestseller and was made into a Netflix film.

Others running in the race include former Ohio treasurer and two-time Senate candidate Josh Mandel; former Ohio GOP Chair Jane Timken; Cleveland businessman and luxury auto dealership giant Bernie Moreno; 2018 Ohio Republican Senate candidate Mike Gibbons, a Cleveland entrepreneur, real estate developer, and investment banker; and Matt Dolan, a longtime state lawmaker whose family owns Major League Baseball’s Cleveland Guardians.

It says so much that JD Vance is “honored” to have the endorsement of vile Marjorie Taylor Greene who has defended the Jan 6 terrorists, spewed anti-Semitism+ anti-Muslim hate plus celebrates white nationalism.

Club for Growth, which is backing a rival candidate in the primary contest, accused Vance of “tearing down President Trump and mocking Trump voters.” But Vance says he’s a strong supporter of Trump these days and is likely to get his endorsement with Greene already giving hers.

“Our country is being taken over by an unholy alliance of leftwing radicals and corporate oligarchs who seek to undermine our God-given rights, destroy traditional American values and force us all to live under their woke authoritarianism,” Greene also said in her statement.

JD Vance received firebrand Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene’s enthusiastic endorsement on Tuesday in Ohio’s crowded 2022 GOP Senate primary fight, emphasizing that “JD is 100% pro-life, pro-2nd Amendment and pro-Trump” which massively triggered leftists.

A source told Fox News that Greene “is beloved by the conservative grassroots across the country, but that her biggest fan might just reside in Mar-a-Lago.”
She will be going to Ohio on Sunday to join Vance on the campaign trail in Loveland.

Ryan is considered the favorite for the Democratic nomination in a very small primary field that includes progressive Morgan Harper, who is a former Consumer Financial Protection Bureau senior adviser and a 2020 congressional candidate.
